title: The Heart of the city
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover, Ian MacNeill, Wim Smits, Ytzen Brusse, Jean-Claude Chiabaut, Leonard Forest, Mogens Gander, Jacques Giraldeau, Kirk Jones, Claus Loof, Hector Lemieux, Terence Macartney-Filgate, Reginald Morris, Erik Nielsen, Bryan Probyn, Francois Seguillon and Derek Knight
brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Lewis Mumford on the city”.
A study of the growing sterility, dullness and congestion that is destroying the vitality, variety and breadth that once made cities physically attractive and humanly creative. Narration: Budd Knapp.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover, Ian MacNeill, Wim Smits, Ytzen Brusse, Jean-Claude Chiabaut, Leonard Forest, Mogens Gander, Jacques Giraldeau, Kirk Jones, Claus Loof, Hector Lemieux, Terence Macartney-Filgate, Reginald Morris, Erik Nielsen, Bryan Probyn, Francois Seguillon and Derek Knight
